name: Demon Magic
summary: You can channel the power of the Abyss through your heritage, producing terrible tangible effects.
description:
You can channel the power of the Abyss through your heritage, producing terrible tangible effects. You can cast paranoia and shatter each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.Traits

Tiefling: A creature with this trait has the tiefling versatile heritage. Tieflings are planar scions descended from fiends. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tieflings.
